verses.verse: קְרָ֤א <WH7121> Cry בְגָרוֹן֙ <WH1627> aloud אַל־ <WH408> not תַּחְשֹׂ֔ךְ <WH2820> spare כַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> like a trumpet הָרֵ֣ם <WH7311> not lift קוֹלֶ֑ךָ <WH6963> up thy voice וְהַגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> and shew לְעַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people פִּשְׁעָ֔ם <WH6588> their transgression וּלְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and the house יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <WH2403> their sins

וְאוֹתִ֗י <WH853> י֥וֹם <WH3117> day יוֹם֙ <WH3117> day יִדְרֹשׁ֔וּן <WH1875> Yet they seek וְדַ֥עַת <WH1847> to know דְּרָכַ֖י <WH1870> my ways יֶחְפָּצ֑וּן <WH2654> and delight כְּג֞וֹי <WH1471> as a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> righteousness עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> that did וּמִשְׁפַּ֤ט <WH4941> not the ordinance אֱלֹהָיו֙ <WH430> of their God לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עָזָ֔ב <WH5800> and forsook יִשְׁאָל֙וּנִי֙ <WH7592> they ask מִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> of me the ordinances צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> of justice קִרְבַ֥ת <WH7132> in approaching אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> to God יֶחְפָּצֽוּן׃ <WH2654> they take delight

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why צַּ֙מְנוּ֙ <WH6684> Wherefore have we fasted וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and thou רָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> [say they] and thou seest עִנִּ֥ינוּ <WH6031> not? [wherefore] have we afflicted נַפְשֵׁ֖נוּ <WH5315> our soul וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no תֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> and thou takest no knowledge הֵ֣ן <WH2005> behold בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> ? Behold in the day צֹֽמְכֶם֙ <WH6685> of your fast תִּמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> ye find חֵ֔פֶץ <WH2656> pleasure וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַצְּבֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6092> all your labours תִּנְגֹּֽשׂוּ׃ <WH5065> and exact

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold לְרִ֤יב <WH7379> for strife וּמַצָּה֙ <WH4683> and debate תָּצ֔וּמוּ <WH6684> Behold ye fast וּלְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> and to smite בְּאֶגְרֹ֣ף <WH106> with the fist רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness לֹא־ <WH3808> not תָצ֣וּמוּ <WH6684> ye shall not fast כַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> as [ye do this] day לְהַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <WH8085> to be heard בַּמָּר֖וֹם <WH4791> on high קוֹלְכֶֽם׃ <WH6963> to make your voice

הֲכָזֶ֗ה <WH2088> this יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> is it צ֣וֹם <WH6685> Is it such a fast אֶבְחָרֵ֔הוּ <WH977> that I have chosen י֛וֹם <WH3117> ? a day עַנּ֥וֹת <WH6031> to afflict אָדָ֖ם <WH120> for a man נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> any הֲלָכֹ֨ף <WH3721> bow down כְּאַגְמֹ֜ן <WH100> as a bulrush רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> his head וְשַׂ֤ק <WH8242> sackcloth וָאֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH665> and ashes יַצִּ֔יעַ <WH3331> and to spread הֲלָזֶה֙ <WH2088> this תִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> [under him]? wilt thou call צ֔וֹם <WH6685> a fast וְי֥וֹם <WH3117> day רָצ֖וֹן <WH7522> and an acceptable לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not זֶה֮ <WH2088> is this צ֣וֹם <WH6685> [Is] not this the fast אֶבְחָרֵהוּ֒ <WH977> that I have chosen פַּתֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH6605> ? to loose חַרְצֻבּ֣וֹת <WH2784> the bands רֶ֔שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness הַתֵּ֖ר <WH5425> to undo אֲגֻדּ֣וֹת <WH92> burdens מוֹטָ֑ה <WH4133> the heavy וְשַׁלַּ֤ח <WH7971> go רְצוּצִים֙ <WH7533> and to let the oppressed חָפְשִׁ֔ים <WH2670> free וְכָל־ <WH3605> every מוֹטָ֖ה <WH4133> of the yoke תְּנַתֵּֽקוּ׃ <WH5423> and that ye break

הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not פָרֹ֤ס <WH6536> [Is it] not to deal לָֽרָעֵב֙ <WH7457> to the hungry לַחְמֶ֔ךָ <WH3899> thy bread וַעֲנִיִּ֥ים <WH6041> the poor מְרוּדִ֖ים <WH4788> that are cast out תָּ֣בִיא <WH935> and that thou bring בָ֑יִת <WH1004> the house כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תִרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> see עָרֹם֙ <WH6174> the naked וְכִסִּית֔וֹ <WH3680> that thou cover וּמִבְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> body לֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תִתְעַלָּֽם׃ <WH5956> him and that thou hide

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יִבָּקַ֤ע <WH1234> break forth כַּשַּׁ֙חַר֙ <WH7837> as the morning אוֹרֶ֔ךָ <WH216> Then shall thy light וַאֲרֻכָתְךָ֖ <WH724> and thine health מְהֵרָ֣ה <WH4120> speedily תִצְמָ֑ח <WH6779> shall spring forth וְהָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> shall go לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before צִדְקֶ֔ךָ <WH6664> and thy righteousness כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> thee the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַאַסְפֶֽךָ׃ <WH622> shall be thy rereward

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> Then shalt thou call וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD יַעֲנֶ֔ה <WH6030> shall answer תְּשַׁוַּ֖ע <WH7768> thou shalt cry וְיֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> and he shall say הִנֵּ֑נִי <WH2005> I am' אִם־ <WH518> If תָּסִ֤יר <WH5493> Here I [am] If thou take away מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <WH8432> from the midst מוֹטָ֔ה <WH4133> of thee the yoke שְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> the putting forth אֶצְבַּ֖ע <WH676> of the finger וְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> and speaking אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> vanity

וְתָפֵ֤ק <WH6329> And [if] thou draw out לָֽרָעֵב֙ <WH7457> to the hungry נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> thy soul וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul נַעֲנָ֖ה <WH6031> the afflicted תַּשְׂבִּ֑יעַ <WH7646> and satisfy וְזָרַ֤ח <WH2224> rise בַּחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> in obscurity אוֹרֶ֔ךָ <WH216> then shall thy light וַאֲפֵלָתְךָ֖ <WH653> and thy darkness כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> [be] as the noonday

וְנָחֲךָ֣ <WH5148> shall guide יְהוָה֮ <WH3069> God תָּמִיד֒ <WH8548> thee continually וְהִשְׂבִּ֤יעַ <WH7646> and satisfy בְּצַחְצָחוֹת֙ <WH6710> in drought נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> thy soul וְעַצְמֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH6106> thy bones יַחֲלִ֑יץ <WH2502> and make fat וְהָיִ֙יתָ֙ <WH1961> become כְּגַ֣ן <WH1588> garden רָוֶ֔ה <WH7302> and thou shalt be like a watered וּכְמוֹצָ֣א <WH4161> and like a spring מַ֔יִם <WH4325> of water אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose לֹא־ <WH3808> not יְכַזְּב֖וּ <WH3576> fail מֵימָֽיו׃ <WH4325> whose waters

וּבָנ֤וּ <WH1129> And [they that shall be] of thee shall build מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> at חָרְב֣וֹת <WH2723> waste places עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> the old מוֹסְדֵ֥י <WH4146> the foundations דוֹר־ <WH1755> of many וָד֖וֹר <WH1755> generations תְּקוֹמֵ֑ם <WH6965> thou shalt raise up וְקֹרָ֤א <WH7121> and thou shalt be called לְךָ֙ גֹּדֵ֣ר <WH1443> The repairer פֶּ֔רֶץ <WH6556> of the breach מְשֹׁבֵ֥ב <WH7725> The restorer נְתִיב֖וֹת <WH5410> of paths לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> to dwell in

אִם־ <WH518> If תָּשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> If thou turn away מִשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> from the sabbath רַגְלֶ֔ךָ <WH7272> thy foot עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> [from] doing חֲפָצֶ֖יךָ <WH2656> thy pleasure בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> on my holy וְקָרָ֨אתָ <WH7121> and call לַשַּׁבָּ֜ת <WH7676> the sabbath עֹ֗נֶג <WH6027> a delight לִקְד֤וֹשׁ <WH6918> the holy יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD מְכֻבָּ֔ד <WH3513> honourable וְכִבַּדְתּוֹ֙ <WH3513> and shalt honour מֵעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> him not doing דְּרָכֶ֔יךָ <WH1870> thine own ways מִמְּצ֥וֹא <WH4672> nor finding חֶפְצְךָ֖ <WH2656> thine own pleasure וְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> nor speaking דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> [thine own] words

אָ֗ז <WH227> Then תִּתְעַנַּג֙ <WH6026> Then shalt thou delight עַל־ <WH5921> in יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> thyself in the LORD וְהִרְכַּבְתִּ֖יךָ <WH7392> and I will cause thee to ride עַל־ <WH5921> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֣מֳתֵי <WH1116> height ק) אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְהַאֲכַלְתִּ֗יךָ <WH398> and feed נַחֲלַת֙ <WH5159> thee with the heritage יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father כִּ֛י <WH3588> For פִּ֥י <WH6310> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס
